subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Two pitches after Nationals Manager Matt Williams pulled Stephen Strasburg, Yoenis Cespedes crushed a two-run homer, giving the Mets a sweep and a seven-game lead in the N.L. East
snippet: Two pitches after Nationals Manager Matt Williams pulled Stephen Strasburg, Yoenis Cespedes crushed a two-run homer, giving the Mets a sweep and a seven-game lead in the N.L. East
